title: Fun Items!
author: JGray
text:
One of the joys of writing Mysteries of the Arcana is I'm not limited to magic items or hard science could be real items. I can basically create anything as long as it feels like it makes sense within the internal logic of MotA.

Black hole contained inside a sword hilt by a contract? Check!

Bubble gum that lets you jump? Check!

Nintendo power glove that amplifies your strength in one arm? Check!

What's your favorite magic/science fantasy tech item that we've created in Mysteries of the Arcana? Tell us in the comments below!

See you Thursday!

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: I'd have to say the Royal Road, it provides a method of tearing the fabric of reality and stepping through to another place.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: I'd say the decorative digital matter storage units. Those things are CRAZY useful.

replies.author: Pseudo*Guest*
replies.text: The Beast, and it's weird-looking engine. Would love to know what makes it tick.
